source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
	  [Amount],
       [Shipment No_],
       [Shipment Line No_],
       [Amount To Customer],
       [Charges To Customer],
       [GST Base Amount],
       [Total GST Amount],
       [Discount Structure Code],
       [Discount Structure Amount],
       [PVC_PPR Cost],
       [Posting Date],
	  '10001' as Site_Code
FROM [dbo].[BIPL - ANDHRA PRADESH$Sales Invoice Line]
where year([Posting Date]) = 2021
UNION ALL
SELECT 
	  [Amount],
       [Shipment No_],
       [Shipment Line No_],
       [Amount To Customer],
       [Charges To Customer],
       [GST Base Amount],
       [Total GST Amount],
       [Discount Structure Code],
       [Discount Structure Amount],
       [PVC_PPR Cost],
